targets.expr: sum by(status) (max by(status, accountId) (last_over_time(pipeline_executions_gauge{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", accountId=~"${accountId:pipe}", status!="APPROVAL_WAITING"}[5m])))

sum(max by(accountId, status) (last_over_time(pipeline_executions_gauge{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", accountId=~"${accountId:pipe}", status!="APPROVAL_WAITING"}[5m])))

panels.title: RUNNING: Pipeline Executions by status [Excluding APPROVAL_WAITING]

targets.expr: topk(10, max by(status, accountId) (last_over_time(pipeline_executions_gauge{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", accountId=~"${accountId:pipe}", status="APPROVAL_WAITING"}[5m])))

sum by(status) (max by(status, accountId) (last_over_time(pipeline_executions_gauge{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", accountId=~"${accountId:pipe}", status="APPROVAL_WAITING"}[5m])))
topk(5, sum by(accountId) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", status=~"FAILED|EXPIRED", edition="ENTERPRISE"}[1h]))) > 10

panels.title: Top Failed/Expired Accounts in last 1 hour

targets.expr: sum by(environment) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", status=~"SUCCEEDED|IGNORE_FAILED", accountId=~"${accountId:pipe}"}[10m]))

panels.title: % of Success Executions in last 10 mins

targets.expr: sum by(environment) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", status=~"FAILED|EXPIRED", accountId=~"${accountId:pipe}"}[10m]))

panels.title: % of Failed/Expired Executions in last 10 mins
Pipeline Completion Count in last 10 mins

targets.expr: sum(max by(accountId, status) (last_over_time(pipeline_executions_gauge{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", status!~"QUEUED", accountId=~"${accountId:pipe}"}[5m])))

sum by(stepType) (max by(stepType, module) (last_over_time(node_execution_active_count_per_module_and_stepType{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", stepType=~"APPROVAL_STAGE|DEPLOYMENT_STAGE_STEP|IntegrationStageStepPMS|CUSTOM_STAGE|FLAG_STAGE|PIPELINE_STAGE|PIPELINE_ROLLBACK_STAGE|IDPStage|SecurityStageStepPMS"}[5m])))

panels.title: Top 5 Accounts Running Executions in last 10 mins (>200)
Rate Of Running Pipeline Executions in last 10 mins

targets.expr: sum by(module) (max by(stepType, module) (last_over_time(node_execution_active_count_per_module_and_stepType{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", stepType!~"NG_SECTION|NG_SECTION_WITH_ROLLBACK_INFO|STAGES_STEP|PIPELINE_SECTION|APPROVAL_STAGE|NG_SECTION_STEP|NG_SPEC_STEP|DEPLOYMENT_STAGE_STEP|IntegrationStageStepPMS|CISPECPMS|NG_EXECUTION|NG_FORK|COMBINED_ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|CUSTOM_STAGE|STEP_GROUP"}[5m])))

topk(10, sum by(stepType) (max by(stepType, module) (last_over_time(node_execution_active_count_per_module_and_stepType{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", namespace="$namespace", stepType!~"NG_SECTION|NG_SECTION_WITH_ROLLBACK_INFO|STAGES_STEP|PIPELINE_SECTION|APPROVAL_STAGE|NG_SECTION_STEP|NG_SPEC_STEP|DEPLOYMENT_STAGE_STEP|IntegrationStageStepPMS|CISPECPMS|NG_EXECUTION|NG_FORK|COMBINED_ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|CUSTOM_STAGE|STEP_GROUP"}[5m]))))
